channel.title: Quest Problem 508
channel.description:
Ok,I had the dragon slayer's quest on my source..So i figured out how to make to where it automaticly gives me the quest points and finish the quest..But when i try to wear dragon plate..It says i need to finish the quest Dragon slayers. So i went into my charcter file Xseil.But then it said i already finished dragon slayer and i have 3 quest points..But i still can't wear a dragon platebody..If you need further information just ask :)
P.S:Could i delete the quest?If so.... how would i do that??

item.title: Quest Problem 508
item.dc:creator: @Xseil Xseil
item.description:
@Xseil wrote:

Ok,I had the dragon slayer’s quest on my source…So i figured out how to make to where it automaticly gives me the quest points and finish the quest…But when i try to wear dragon plate…It says i need to finish the quest Dragon slayers.
So i went into my charcter file Xseil.But then it said i already finished dragon slayer and i have 3 quest points…But i still can’t wear a dragon platebody…If you need further information just ask
